question: Does benchpressing stunt your growth or help you grow?
question_content: im 15 and im 5 ft 8.5 i weigh 126 pounds and i play basketball for freshmen and jv team my coach said i really need to start benching i heard that benching stunting your growth is a myth but i dont want to take a chance also how do you when or  how much weight to put on the benchpress is it okay to do it every other day

answers.answer_content: no stay away from squats and military press
